detail_desc: Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side, pleats at one side of the hem and a high slit at the front. Unlined.
A-line dress in thin, patterned sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a detachable braided imitation suede belt and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a shimmering metallic appliqué on the front. Jersey-lined hood, long sleeves with a contrasting colour panel, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem.

Blouse in a slub-weave viscose blend containing some linen. Square neckline, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders. Gently shaping seams front and back and a seam at the waist.
Scarf in a softly draping, patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Fitted T-shirt in soft, patterned jersey made from a cotton and viscose blend. Short frill trim with overlocked edges around the sleeves.
V-neck jumper in a soft knit with long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in a crêpe weave with side pockets and straight, wide legs. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short 5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly, button at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Padded gilet in a patterned weave. Detachable hood with ears on top, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Lined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Flared top in soft jersey with an elasticated neckline and flounce at the top that continues across the shoulders. Overlocked edges.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and gathered elastication up from the hem at the back.
Gently flared skirt in patterned tulle with a glittery elastic waistband with a decorative bow. Lined.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt pockets with a decorative button at the back. Legs with creases.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Slippers in soft faux fur with anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Soft pile slippers with appliqués. Pile linings and insoles and soles in fabric and rubber with anti-slip protectors.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Knee-length dirndl with a detachable apron. Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with lace trims, a deep, square neckline and decorative lacing at the front. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a pocket in one side. Apron with long ties and decorative lace trims above the hem. Lined at the top.

Long-sleeved dress in lace made from a soft cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline and a zip at the back. Seam at the waist with a grosgrain bow and a gently flared skirt. Jersey-lined bodice and skirt.
Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, buttons at the top and short, wide sleeves. Pin-tucks at the front and shoulders, and a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Padded lightweight gilet that can be worn under a jacket as an extra layer. V-neck, press-studs down the front and welt side pockets. Lined.
A-line skirt in soft cotton corduroy with two press-studs at the top and decorative buttons down the front.
Straight-cut shirt in imitation leather with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Long jacket in jacquard-patterned jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Boots in imitation suede with a calf-length shaft and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Satin nightslip with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a wide lace trim.
Fully lined, off-the-shoulder bikini top with short puff sleeves and a drawstring at the front. Elastication around the top, sleeves and hem.
Knee-length shorts in printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and fake front pockets.
T-shirt in printed cotton with a wider neckline. Slightly longer at the back.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Dungarees in cotton corduroy with press-studs at the sides, adjustable straps with press-studs at the front, and side and back pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 3-12M.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a detachable, pile-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, a welt chest pocket, flap front pockets with press-studs, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Jersey T-shirt.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a resort collar, pearly buttons down the front and a straight hem.
Knee-length cycling shorts in sturdy jersey with a regular, elasticated waist, flatlock seams and a foil print.
Leggings in a fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trousers in striped organic cotton bonded jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots in imitation suede with a decorative scalloped edge, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Negligee in patterned mesh with a push-up bra. The bra has moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Vest tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

Crop top in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and wide ribbing at the hem. The polyamide content of the top is partly recycled. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Shirt in a textured viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. High slits in the sides and ties at the hem.
Cold shoulder dress in a patterned cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a gathered yoke. Short sleeves with elastication at the top, and a flounced hem.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with a V-neck front and back, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lace layer at the top.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a shawl collar, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a pocket in woven fabric and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Suede boots with lacing at the front. Fabric linings, leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with short, wide sleeves and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and ties at one side. Unlined.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Metal ring with large stones made from recycled plastic.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.
Calf-length A-line dress in an airy cotton weave with a frill-trimmed neckline and narrow shoulder straps. A seam below the hips and at the hem for added volume. Unlined.
Bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and gathers at the back.
Suede ankle boots with peep toes, open lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif.
Short lace dress with a small frilled collar and short, flounced sleeves. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.

Hoodie knitted in soft, thermal fleece. Zip down the front with a chin guard, kangaroo pockets and a jersey trim around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The hoodie is made partly from recycled polyester.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with decorative gathers at the back and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections and a concealed drawstring at the waist with a key pocket in the waistband.
Wide shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Striped top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Tops with short sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 1-4Y). Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Rain jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with closed seams. Drawstring hood, press-studs down the front, and flap pockets with a press-stud. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Shirt in a premium cotton dobby weave with a grandad collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Short dress in an airy viscose and cotton weave with a collar and V-neck opening at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an asymmetric seam with gathers at the waist for added width. Unlined.
Braided bracelets in various designs. Adjustable length.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a soft, organic cotton knit. Jumper with buttons down one side and long raglan sleeves. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist.
